title: The Godfather
actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Diane Keaton
shortDescription: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.

title: Scarface
writers: Oliver Stone, Howard Hawks, Ben Hecht
actors: Al Pacino, Michelle Pfeiffer, Steven Bauer
shortDescription: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

title: Schindler's List
actors: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley
shortDescription: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: Fight Club
actors: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf
shortDescription: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
